description: The namespace to install the storage drivers.
name: namespace

description: IP address of ONTAP management LIF
name: managementLIF

description: Username to connect to the storage device
name: username

description: Password to connect to the storage device
name: password

description: NAS option for the NFS export policy to use; defaults to default
name: exportPolicy

description: Maximum requestable volume size and qtree parent volume size
name: limitVolumeSize

description: Fail provisioning if usage is above this percentage
name: limitAggregateUsage

description: Fine grained control of NFS mount options; defaults to -o nfsvers=4
name: nfsMountOptions
